item.title: Android + IOIO + Garage Door
item.description: Control your garage door with Android and IOIO. For additional background information on interfacing Android with IOIO, check out my other introductory tutorials: Android + IOIO + Simple Digital Output Android + IOIO + Simple Digital Input Android + IOIO + Simple Analog Output Android + IOIO + Simple Analog Input Background on Android development, IOIO, and electronics: Meet IOIO IOIO for Android Beginners Guide IOIO Wiki Android Developer’s Guide
